name: vat-rate-calculator
author: Amadou Sylla
description: This module provides from the standard value added tax calculation formula who is below ```txt HT = ATI / (1 + decimal of VAT) ATI = TF * (1 + decimal of VAT) VAT = TF * (decimal of VAT) 			NOTE:  decimal value of VAT => VAT rate/100 	VAT => value added tax 	 TF => tax free 	ATI => all tax included ``` ## Installation
